content: Those are all good points, but the biggest one is that it just has No Soul… It’s like an airport shopping mall. Lots of the features are awesome, but the combination is simply terribly generic. As a comparison, the San Jose Earthquake soccer stadium cost 1/10 as much, but actually has real character, with the largest outdoor bar in the region on one side, and a bunch of food trucks to drive dinner at the game vs the just worthless mix of benefits at Levi.
